Articles.Content: Hi for some reason, the vessel has full tanks but the game says i have 0 delta v

Hi there, 

To be able to help we need at least a tiny bit more of information as outlined here:

Also a screenshot of your craft might be helpful too.

ok my addons are all up to date and there are installed correctly. getting a screenshot right now. (reproduction steps: build any craft and launch with full tanks. It will say 0 dv but i can use engines

Edited January 13, 2021 by Rocketry101

1 hour ago, Rocketry101 said:

ok my addons are all up to date and there are installed correctly. getting a screenshot right now. (reproduction steps: build any craft and launch with full tanks. It will say 0 dv but i can use engines

We can't reproduce your issue unless we have your mod list.

Maybe try it without mods and see if the issue persists, then you'll know whether it's a stock or mod bug.

I've seen that issue too. Sometimes, its a glitch and exiting, then re-loading the vessel from scratch in the VAB fixes it. And some of the time, its a true indication because the staging is messed up or all the fuel was burnt in a previous stage etc. So its worth doing a thorough check first, then a reload, etc...

no like it always happens dspite correct staging. Also it is not a mod bug but i have a modded game. I know it not mod as i have seen this in stock.

thanks but not work

19 minutes ago, paul_c said:

I've seen that issue too. Sometimes, its a glitch and exiting, then re-loading the vessel from scratch in the VAB fixes it. And some of the time, its a true indication because the staging is messed up or all the fuel was burnt in a previous stage etc. So its worth doing a thorough check first, then a reload, etc...
